Package View

Class DisplayPatientAppointment

java.lang.Object
View.MainView
View.DisplayPatientAppointment
public class DisplayPatientAppointment extends MainView
The DisplayPatientAppointment class manages the patient's interface for handling appointments.

This class allows patients to:

  • Schedule appointments with available doctors
  • View their appointments
  • Reschedule pending appointments
  • Cancel pending appointments

This class is part of the View layer in the application.

Since:
2024-11-17
